description:
Application to vary wording of condition 2 (Approved Drawings) and condition 8 (BREEAM) of planning permission reference P101570 dated 11 October 2010 for the: 'Construction of a first floor extension to the rear of the building and a third and set back fourth floor extension to the main part of the building fronting Clifton Terrace. A change of use is proposed for the lower ground to first floors from office (B1 use class) to theatre (sui generis use class) comprising flexible theatre / rehearsal space, cafe/ bar and ancillary facilities. A change of use / creation of 5 residential units is proposed for the upper floors. The proposals include alterations to the front and rear elevations of the building and the introduction of a projecting bay window to the front elevation at first floor level.'
This application seeks to make minor-material amendments to the approved development including:
- replace the approved folded prodema timber screen with render (front elevation);
- increase in height of north elevation wall by up to 215mm; and
- removal of window from the third floor, rear elevation.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 11 October 2013.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 11 October 2010 [LBI ref: P101570].  Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5)
